attributes.action: not give in to the car lobby, but instead to make Britain the world’s leading country on climate change by introducing a truly green tax on car travel, in a completely fair manner, so that you pay directly for the pollution you cause, through a road tax based on CO2 emissions of the vehicle and miles travelled per annum.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As road transport users, car drivers, and young people who would like to see a greener future, we recognise that we have a responsibility to prevent global warming from ruining this planet for future generations, and have decided it is time to take a stand against the short-term views of the car lobby. 

We insist that any extra revenue raised through pay-for-pollution travel is spent on long-term, sustainable solutions to transport problems, which will benefit all sections of society, especially the most vulnerable.
